description:
The returned Orochi clashes the Akazaya members who are trying to save Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others are all covered in bruises, but they unite their strength and launch an attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gegenschlag der Supernovas! – Operation: Treibt die Kaiser auseinander
Les Supernovae contre-attaquent. Le plan de séparation des Empereurs !
The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!
Ответный удар Сверхновых! Разнести Йонко на части!
النّاشئون الخارقون يردّون الهجوم! مهمّة تفريق اليونكو
超新星反撃! 四皇分解作戦
